name: Eve
overview: Drama combining sci-fi mystery adventure with fish-out-of-water comedy. Eve is the world's first fully sentient 'artificial person'. She seems human, but under the surface she's a robot capable of amazing feats - if she can navigate her way through the perils of teenage life first.

episodes.name: All About Eve
episodes.overview: When humanoid robot Eve comes to live at Will's house, he struggles to keep her identity secret.

episodes.name: A Real Girl
episodes.overview: Eve struggles to fit in with the outside world when Lily's brother Abe takes her shopping.

episodes.name: Beautiful Game
episodes.overview: Will begs Eve to play for his failing football team, while Lily discovers a mysterious Wi-Fi signal and sets out to discover its source.

episodes.name: The Bubble Bursts
episodes.overview: Abe puts his feet up while Eve does his after-school deliveries. But when Eve goes into overdrive saving the planet, life gets dangerous.

episodes.name: Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: Eve is warned that ice cream and electronics don't mix, but she's desperate to taste it. Nick worries about the technology inside her.

episodes.name: Things That Go Beep in the Night
episodes.overview: Will wants to take Eve to a Halloween party, but Nick forbids it. And when Nick discovers that his boss Katherine has found a way to track down the location of the military chip inside Eve, a desperate diversion is needed.

episodes.name: The X & Y Factor
episodes.overview: Katherine suspects that Nick knows more about Project Eternity than he’s letting on and dispatches Zac to flirt with Eve and gather information about Nick’s secret work.

episodes.name: The Truth About Lies
episodes.overview: Eve learns about lying from master of deception Abe and is soon an expert. Meanwhile Will and Lily make Katherine suspicious of Zac.

episodes.name: Trashed
episodes.overview: Eve plays tricks on her own memory and forgets information that is key to her survival. To help her, Will and Lily go on a perilous journey.

episodes.name: Mum's the Word
episodes.overview: Someone important comes back into Eve's life. Abe accidentally gives Katherine a huge clue about Project Eternity's whereabouts.

episodes.name: IT Girl
episodes.overview: Eve goes to school to help Lily but ends up getting them both in trouble.

episodes.name: The Robot Next Door
episodes.overview: Eve must stop Mr Bevan revealing her identity, and Katherine traps Nick into a confession.

episodes.name: Eternity
episodes.overview: Eve faces her most dangerous moments yet. Her friends desperately want to save her, but has Eve become too human to save herself?

episodes.name: Christmas Eve
episodes.overview: It's Eve's first Christmas and after finding a way to connect to her mother, she has a million questions in her mind. She contacts Mary Douglas, but instead of answers, she contracts a software virus which activates her latent ability to dream. When Will finds Eve in an unresponsive state he works tirelessly with Nick, Lily and Katherine to figure out what's wrong with her. They get a window into Eve's dream state, but Eve's brain wasn't wired to cope with imaginative visions and it's behaving weirdly. The software virus sends Eve into a cheerless parallel world, and as Eve can't distinguish between reality and dream, her systems start to shut down. Can Will and the gang save Eve from her Christmas nightmare? And can Abe escape his own nightmare - being 'Santa's little helper', dressed as a Christmas elf?

episodes.name: Do Not Build Them
episodes.overview: Calimov attracts the attention of an anti-artificial intelligence group called PRICE.

episodes.name: Truth or Dare
episodes.overview: Zac returns from Cuba determined to win Eve back

episodes.name: The Mark of Cain
episodes.overview: Eve offers to babysit Lily's tearaway cousin Zoe.

episodes.name: Party Girl
episodes.overview: Eve becomes obsessed with the idea of canoeing on a lake.

episodes.name: Power Games
episodes.overview: Abe gets Eve to help him selling mobile phones in the park.

episodes.name: The Eve of Destruction
episodes.overview: Eve apparently causes a series of strange electrical surges.

episodes.name: A Case of Identity
episodes.overview: Nick and Katherine attempt to discover the robot's identity by tricking Mary.

episodes.name: All About Adam
episodes.overview: The gang is faced with Zac, his identical clone Adam, and no way of working out who is who.

episodes.name: Giving Up the Ghost
episodes.overview: To cheer Eve up, Abe suggests a ghost hunt.

episodes.name: Fair Cop
episodes.overview: Lily is arrested for hacking Lord Hoffman's computer.

episodes.name: Her Sister's Keeper
episodes.overview: With Will's help, Katherine's new robot, KT, comes alive.

episodes.name: A Change in the World
episodes.overview: Will agrees to be Mary's prisoner to save KT and find out about the blue flash.

episodes.name: Children of Eve
episodes.overview: Eve's attempts to help her sister KT pass for human are derailed by Katherine.

episodes.name: New Born
episodes.overview: Rebecca and Nick take Will to Calimov to run tests on him.

episodes.name: Infinity Plus One
episodes.overview: Cain and Michael Hoffman go to the Clarke house. Will Eve be able to evade discovery?

episodes.name: Possession
episodes.overview: Will struggles to control his nanobots and his feelings for Lily.

episodes.name: Invasion
episodes.overview: Having been possessed by Mary, Eve is on high alert. Meanwhile, Abe has to deal with the arrival of his grandma.
